title: STF arrests man for heroin possession
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Sri Lanka Police Special Task Force (STF) has arrested a person for possessing Heroin.
A a 44-year-old resident of Malpiyali Mawath Malkaduwawa, Kurunegala, was found in possession of 2 g & 520 mg, and Rs.15,000/- in cash.
He was arrested and handed over to the Kurunegala Police Station for further investigations.
